description: This script verifies the readiness of a FastAPI backend by checking importability of dependencies and application modules, launching a temporary Uvicorn server, and performing a health check via HTTP GET /health.

classes.name: uvicorn.Server
classes.description: Uvicorn server class used to start and control the FastAPI application server

classes.name: uvicorn.Config
classes.description: Configuration class for Uvicorn server setup

methods.name: _port()
methods.description: Fetches the port number from environment variable or defaults to 3001

methods.name: _check_imports()
methods.description: Validates that necessary modules and application can be imported successfully

methods.name: bool _wait_port(host: str, port: int, timeout: float = 10.0)
methods.description: Waits until a TCP port is open and accepting connections or times out

methods.name: main()
methods.description: Main function that starts the server, waits for it to be ready, and performs a health check

ctags.name: _wait_port
ctags.pattern: /^def _wait_port(host: str, port: int, timeout: float = 10.0) -> bool:$/
